channel.title: How do i make something auto-spawn?
channel.description:
I want to make... Let's just say, a white party hat spawn in a certain location. So, I just want it to pop up out of no where every 15 seconds.
Also, how do I make the server say like a public message every 10 seconds?

item.title: How do i make something auto-spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

Well Here’s for the white phat:

drop = 8299 %%%% $$$$ & @ # White Phat %= X-Coords $= Y-Coords &= Amount @= Height #= Type
Add this is Drops.cfg

NOTE: I Don’t know or the seconds it will respawn xD

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make something auto-spawn?
